zenscript-unicode-converter.letter-case: Use lower case in Unicode. False for upper case.
zenscript-unicode-converter.comment-conv: Unicode conversion of the comment is carried out
zenscript-unicode-converter.auto-convers: Convert automatically when the ZenScript source file is saved
Convert automatically when the ZenScript source file is activated
zenscript-unicode-converter.use-files.as: Use "files.associations" in the settings.json for the automatic conversions
